CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Intake_Location__c, 'TS Brockton') && ISPICKVAL(Campaign.Service_Year__c , '2017-2018') && Active__c = True && ISPICKVAL( Post_Secondary_Enrollment_Status__c , 'Enrolled or Deferred PSE (TS)') , 'Goal # achieved' , 'Goal # not achieved' )
CustomField.label: DB - TS Brockton - 5 DELETE
